You can also find this model’s 3-channel counterpart at $469.99 shipped, or browse all the brand has to offer in its storefront here. items.title: Tackle storm cleanup, firewood collections, more with Greenworks’ 24V 10-inch cordless compact chainsaw at $99 (Save $41)
items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the Greenworks 24V 10-inch Cordless Compact Chainsaw with a 2.0Ah battery for $99.39 shipped, beating out its direct website pricing by $41, where it is still posted up at its full $140 price tag. We’ve mostly seen discounts over the year keeping costs above $110, though there have been falls lower to $105, $100, and $99 peppered in. While we’ve seen it drop a little further than these rates in past years, you’re still getting the best price of 2025 that we have tracked here, with $41 savings that drops costs $1 below Black Friday pricing.
